name: Squares
description: A quick generative art project with squares.

name: SIR By Area
description: An unrealistic susceptible-infected-removed demonstration of a virus, with transmission based on how often an area is visited.

name: SIR By Proximity
description: An unrealistic susceptible-infected-removed demonstration of a virus, with transmission based on proximity to others infected.

name: Fireworks
description: Yeah, it's fireworks. What else is there to say?

name: Maze Generator And Solver
description: It generates a maze, and then solves it. These names are pretty on point.

name: Neural Net Colors
description: A neural network decides what color something is based on rgb values. tl;dr a criminal underuse of AI.

name: Particle Hexagon Test
description: I don't know what this is, you'll see.
